Title: Speak, Memory.
Subtitle: An Autobiography Revisited.
Authors: Vladimir Nabokov;Vladimir Vladimirovich Nabokov.
Categories: Novelists, American.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=hjBIWkO2wgsC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: An autobiographical volume covering Nabokov's first 40 years up to his departure from Europe for America at the outset of World War II, telling of his emergence as a writer, his early loves and his marriage, his passion for butterflies and his lost homeland..
